document_data.name: Thunsroon Frostbryn
document_data.mainbody: '''Thunsroon "Thunderhand" Frostbryn''' was a [[human]] [[wizard]] of [[Elversult]] on the [[Dragon Coast]].
document_data.Description: Thunsroon was a powerful and brash man.
document_data.Personality: Thunderhand often participated in magical duels and enjoyed publicly humiliating anyone who threatened or tricked him. He was also a known [[planewalker]] traveling to other worlds and [[planes]].
